--- Soundwave / Bonecrusher / Switchblade / Astroblast ---

	Soundwave looks at his cassettes, sending them all telepathic 
messages. (ONLY with his cassettes. If anyone objects notify me.) 
<Havotron is gone, and he has left us and the Constructicons 
behind.> Soundwave smiles, <That means we stay with Lord 
Megatron.> "Rumble, Frenzy, Spasstik: Return." His chest opens 
up and Frenzy leaps up transforming into cassette mode and 
sliding in.

	Bonecrusher looks at his fellow constructicons, mildly 
confused, "Uhh, so that means we are staying here? Cause I'm 
gonna." He walks over to Hook. Looks at the damaged bot, and 
frowns.

>|< <|> >|< <|> >|< <|> >|< <|> >|< <|> >|< <|> >|< <|> 

	Switchblade twitches as two more missiles smash into the top 
of the ship. The armour was weakening, but could still sustain 
several more missile rounds. 
	"Uhh RAGNUS!" Switchblade yells in the large bot's ear, 
"You've gotta get those jets off our back, and fast." Not waiting for 
an answer, he manually controls the autoguns and missiles 
launcher, firing off a successful thirty bullets, and two missiles at 
the attacking ship. 
	Noting that the sensors pick up Astroblast's signature near by 
on the Azores Islands, he opens a commlink to Astroblast. 
"Astroblast, we've got a bogey on our back side making passes 
with missiles, and I'm not sure how much longer we can hold out. 
Get your self over here and eliminate the enemy. I'm trying to deter 
him with the ship's defenses, but, well, I'm not having much luck." 
Switchblade sighs as he closes the commlink. Scanners indicate 
that the ship is heading past the tip of Newfoundland this moment.

	Astroblast looks up as he receives the commlink, replying 
immediately. "All right, we can't lose the ship now, I'll be right 
over." He opens a commlink to Stratus. "Stratus, the main base is 
under attack and I"m going over to mess up a bot, so you're in 
charge of getting that ship down there to the surface. Abominus will 
try to help." He chuckles, "Astroblast out."
	The moderately tall subcommander transforms into spaceship 
mode, and fires his rear and vertical thrusters at once, heading off 
towards the Dark Avian. His scanners pick up the enemy quite 
quickly but he is too far away to engage.
